data.title: Delta Goodrem's Dating and Relationship History
data.meta_description: Delta Goodrem has made an impact on the entertainment scene. With a successful career as a singer-songwriter, actress, and television personality, this ...
data.text:
Delta Goodrem has made an impact on the entertainment scene. With a successful career as a singer-songwriter, actress, and television personality, this Australian sensation has been wowing audiences for over two decades. From her chart-topping hits to roles on popular shows like Neighbours, it's clear that Delta is a force to be reckoned with in pop culture.

Love knows no bounds in Delta Goodrem relationships. Her array of whirlwind romances and heartwarming connections include some eyebrow-raising age differences! But each relationship adds depth to understanding Delta Goodrem.

A fascinating example is her ongoing relationship with musician Matthew Copley. They have been a couple since 2017 and they continue to create music together even today. In sharp contrast, there was her fleeting romance with American heartthrob Nick Jonas back in 2011 when he was still just 18 years old, while Delta was a full eight years his senior. Their short-lived affair attracted much pubic attention. Hunky Australian rugby player Drew Mitchell was linked romantically to Goodrem in 2016, adding a dash of sporty spice to her dating history. Each of these connections offers insights into various aspects of this actor's journey.

These puzzle pieces help fans understand how these varied relationships have impacted this dynamic artist's journey both inside and outside the limelight. By not only appreciating her professional accomplishments but also acknowledging her pivotal romances, this offers a more comprehensive picture of Delta Goodrem as a cultural icon.

Matthew Copley

Delta Goodrem began dating musician and her guitarist Matthew Copley in January 2018.

Delta Goodrem dated Australian rugby player Drew Mitchell from August to December 2016.

Drew Alan Mitchell (born 26 March 1984) is a former Australian rugby union player. He played on the wing or as fullback. Up to the 2006 season he played for the Queensland Reds. He played for the Western Force for the 2007â€“09 Super 14 seasons. From 2010 to 2013 he played for the New South Wales Waratahs. Since 2013 he has played for RC Toulon. He made his debut for Australia in 2005 and is Australia's highest try scorer in World Cup history.

Age : 40

Birthplace : Liverpool, Australia

Darren McMullen

Back in 2012, on the first season on The Voice, Darren McMullen was rumored to be dating Delta Goodrem after the pair were spotted exchanging kisses and holding hands on numerous occasions.

Age : 42

Birthplace : Glasgow, Scotland

Delta Goodrem dated Nick Jonas from May 2011 to February 2012.

Nick Jonas, born on September 16, 1992, in Dallas, Texas, is a multifaceted artist who has made substantial contributions to the world of music, acting, and philanthropy. His journey into stardom began at a young age when he was discovered singing in a hair salon at seven years old. This event led to his Broadway debut in A Christmas Carol, marking the start of his illustrious career. The Jonas Brothers, a pop-rock band formed by Nick and his older brothers Kevin and Joe, catapulted him to international fame. The band released their first album, It's About Time, in 2006, followed by several other successful albums such as Jonas Brothers, A Little Bit Longer, and Lines, Vines and Trying Times. After the band's disbandment in 2013, Nick continued his musical journey, releasing solo projects like Nick Jonas and Last Year Was Complicated, which established him as a mature, independent artist. The Jonas Brothers reunited in 2019 with the band's single, "Sucker." Beyond music, Jonas has also demonstrated his prowess in acting, starring in TV shows like Scream Queens and Kingdom, and movies like Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle. He has also been an active advocate for diabetes awareness, having been diagnosed with Type 1 diabetes at a young age.

Age : 31

Birthplace : Dallas, Texas, USA

In 2004, Delta Goodrem began dating former Westlife singer Brian McFadden. They broke up in April 2011.

Brian Nicholas McFadden (born 12 April 1980) is an Irish singer, songwriter and television presenter who rose to fame in 1998 as a member of the Irish boy band Westlife. Following his departure from Westlife in 2004, McFadden released his debut solo album, Irish Son. He has since released four studio albums: Set in Stone, Wall of Soundz, The Irish Connection, and Otis.

Age : 44

Birthplace : Republic of Ireland, Artane, Dublin, Dublin

In 2004, Delta Goodrem dated Australian tennis player Mark Philippoussis, while she was battling with cancer. The relationship ended after reports of him cheating on her.

Mark Anthony Philippoussis ( FIL-ih-POO-sis; born 7 November 1976) is an Australian retired tennis player of Greek and Italian descent. He turned professional in 1994. His greatest achievements are winning two Davis Cup titles with Australia in 1999 and 2003, winning the deciding rubber in the final of each. He also reached the finals of the 1998 US Open and the 2003 Wimbledon tournaments, losing to countryman Pat Rafter and Swiss Roger Federer respectively. He reached a career-high singles ranking of world No. 8. He has had a minor career in modelling and starred in the American reality television dating show Age of Love. He is nicknamed 'the Scud', after the Scud missile.

Age : 47

Birthplace : Melbourne, Australia
